name: Merchant Dungeon
description:
Merchant Dungeon: My entry for the #mizjam1 and my first game jam project ever!

The game seems to be very laggy when using firefox coupled with privacy-enhancing extensions and some features like sprinting don't work (did not see that coming). Therefore if you want the full, smoother experience (how it was imagined) please download the game, disable your extensions or use chrome.

Credits:

Miziziziz (for hosting this jam being a great inspiration)
GameEndeavor (for partly inspiring the combat system)
Kenney (for providing this art pack)

IgnasD - opengameart.org (walk/footstep sound)
artisticdude - opengameart.org (RPG Sound Pack)
Phil Michalski/PMSFX (various sounds)
LeshyLabs (for their SFDesigner)
